posts.title: Puff-N-Fluff Dog Dryer
posts.content: Warm Scruffums up after a much needed bath with the Puff-N-Fluff dog dryer. Once your furry friend gets inside the bag, the machine quickly dries him without causing a mess, making it ideal for use after showers and rainy walks in the park.

posts.title: 3-In-1 Game Table
posts.content: Get your family off of their electronic devices and interacting with each other by bringing in this 3-in-1 game table into your home. The space-saving design allows you to easily switch between a ping pong table, a pool table, and an air hockey table.

posts.title: The Floor Is Lava Floor/Wall Decal
posts.content: THE FLOOR IS LAVA! Maintain a lively atmosphere at home by keeping everyone on their toes with this floor is lava floor/wall decal. This incredible 3D decal turns a simple trip down the hallway into a heart-pumping experience that surely put your agility to the test.

posts.title: Starry Night Projector
posts.content: Enjoy a majestic nighttime sky even if smog or light pollution have overshadowed the actual sky above with the starry night projector. It projects 360 degrees of jaw dropping visuals ideal for introducing kids to astronomy or creating a romantic mood for an intimate date.

posts.title: Bose Noise-Masking Sleepbuds
posts.content: Slumber more soundly than you ever thought possible by inserting these noise-masking sleepbuds from Bose in your ears before hitting the hay. Instead of music, these sleepbuds play a series of pre-loaded soothing sounds that cover up unwanted outside noise.

posts.title: Slanket Sleeved Blanket
posts.content: Do you like the idea of the Snuggie blanket, but wish it a higher quality that doesn’t fall apart when you wash it? The Slanket uses the same design as the Snuggie, allowing use of your hands while wearing a blanket, except it is a higher quality fabric.

posts.title: App Controlled Paper Airplane Kit
posts.content: Finally, a paper airplane for the modern age! Now you can build an agile little plane that can actually fly by using this app controlled paper airplane kit. The plane is easy to set up and can perform death-defying maneuvers like barrel rolls, spins, and loops.

posts.title: World’s Most Advanced Gaming Mouse
posts.content: Interact with your PC in a faster and more precise way using the world’s most advanced gaming mouse. The intuitive design allows you to assign any action or modifier to specialized tilt and pivoting movements for a more responsive gaming experience.

posts.title: NERF Blaster Modification Guide
posts.content: Gain an upper hand in battle by improving your existing NERF blaster with help from this great modification guide. The man behind the YouTube Channel “Out of Darts” will show you how to create a cooler looking blaster with improved firing capacity, range, and speed.

posts.title: Wireless Underwater Fishing Camera
posts.content: Increase your chances of success when you hit the water for a bit of fishing by bringing along this wireless underwater fishing camera. This compact cam allows you to effortlessly see what’s directly below your hook from the comfort of your smartphone’s screen.

posts.title: Viking Axe Straight Shaving Razor
posts.content: Keep your facial game on check like a true Nordic warrior by mansccaping your mug using this Viking axe straight shaving razor. This awesome straight razor is forged out of tempered steel and is complemented by a handmade beech wood and copper or brass handle.

posts.title: Spherical Crystal Lens
posts.content: Level up your photography game by creating some mind-blowing effects using this spherical crystal lens. Available in either an 80mm or 60mm size, each scratch-resistant K9 crystal beautifully reflects an inverted view of your surroundings.
